sample_data.name: Lululemon
sample_data.notes: Known for athletic fits and garment-specific sizing.
Separate from outerwear guide; excluded 'belt' column because not worth bringing in for this category or distinguishing it from waist and hips
Size guide for clive shirt specifically; chest = full (doubled from 1/2 chest); sleeve = converted to CBL to cuff (from shoulder-to-cuff + 9")

sample_data.raw_text:
Department: Men
Category: Tops
Fit Type: Regular
Unit: Inches
Measurement Type: Garment
Notes: Sleeve Length is shoulder-to-cuff. Chest is half-chest width and should be doubled to get full chest.
Product Name: Clive

Measurement Name,S,M,L,XL,XXL
1/2 Chest Width,19.7,20.5,21.3,22,23.2
Center Back Length,26.6,27,27.4,27.8,28.1
Sleeve Length,25.6,26,26.4,26.8,27.2

sample_data.notes: Doubled 1/2 chest width to store as full chest (inches).
Added 9 inches to convert shoulder-to-cuff to center-back-to-cuff (CBL to cuff).

sample_data.product_name: Men's Long-Sleeved Capilene Cool Daily Shirt

user_action_history.definition:
SELECT ua.id,
    ua.user_id,
    u.email AS user_email,
    ua.session_id,
    ua.action_type,
    ua.target_table,
    ua.target_id,
    ua.previous_values,
    ua.new_values,
    ua.metadata,
    ua.is_undone,
    ua.undone_at,
    ua.created_at,
        CASE
            WHEN (ua.action_type = 'update_feedback'::text) THEN ('Updated feedback for garment #'::text || ua.target_id)
            WHEN (ua.action_type = 'add_garment'::text) THEN ('Added new garment #'::text || ua.target_id)
            WHEN (ua.action_type = 'view_garment'::text) THEN ('Viewed garment #'::text || ua.target_id)
            ELSE ua.action_type
        END AS description
   FROM (user_actions ua
     JOIN users u ON ((ua.user_id = u.id)))
  ORDER BY ua.created_at DESC;

size_guide_entries_with_brand.definition:
SELECT e.id,
    e.size_guide_id,
    e.size_label,
    e.chest_min,
    e.chest_max,
    e.chest_range,
    e.waist_min,
    e.waist_max,
    e.waist_range,
    e.sleeve_min,
    e.sleeve_max,
    e.sleeve_range,
    e.neck_min,
    e.neck_max,
    e.neck_range,
    e.center_back_length,
    e.notes,
    e.created_at,
    e.created_by,
    e.updated_at,
    e.updated_by,
    e.hip_min,
    e.hip_max,
    e.hip_range,
    g.brand_id,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    g.gender,
    g.category_id,
    g.fit_type,
    g.unit
   FROM ((size_guide_entries e
     JOIN size_guides g ON ((e.size_guide_id = g.id)))
     JOIN brands b ON ((g.brand_id = b.id)));

user_feedback_by_dimension.definition:
SELECT u.id AS user_id,
    u.email AS user_email,
    u.gender AS user_gender,
    ug.id AS user_garment_id,
    ug.product_name,
    ug.size_label,
    ug.fit_type,
    ug.owns_garment,
    ug.created_at AS garment_created_at,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    c.name AS category_name,
    sc.name AS subcategory_name,
    ugf.dimension,
    fc.feedback_text,
    fc.feedback_type,
    fc.is_positive,
    ugf.created_at AS feedback_created_at,
    ugf.created_by AS feedback_created_by
   FROM ((((((users u
     JOIN user_garments ug ON ((u.id = ug.user_id)))
     JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     JOIN categories c ON ((ug.category_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN subcategories sc ON ((ug.subcategory_id = sc.id)))
     JOIN user_garment_feedback ugf ON ((ug.id = ugf.user_garment_id)))
     JOIN feedback_codes fc ON ((ugf.feedback_code_id = fc.id)))
  ORDER BY u.email, ug.created_at DESC, ugf.dimension;

user_garments_actual_feedback.definition:
SELECT u.id AS user_id,
    u.email AS user_email,
    ug.id AS garment_id,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    ug.product_name,
    ug.size_label,
    ug.fit_type,
    c.name AS category_name,
    sc.name AS subcategory_name,
    ug.created_at AS garment_created_at,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'overall'::text) THEN fc.feedback_text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS overall_feedback,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'chest'::text) THEN fc.feedback_text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS chest_feedback,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'sleeve'::text) THEN fc.feedback_text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS sleeve_feedback,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'length'::text) THEN fc.feedback_text
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS length_feedback,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'overall'::text) THEN fc.feedback_type
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS overall_feedback_type,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'chest'::text) THEN fc.feedback_type
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS chest_feedback_type,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'sleeve'::text) THEN fc.feedback_type
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS sleeve_feedback_type,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'length'::text) THEN fc.feedback_type
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS length_feedback_type,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'overall'::text) THEN
            CASE
                WHEN fc.is_positive THEN 'positive'::text
                ELSE 'negative'::text
            END
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS overall_sentiment,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'chest'::text) THEN
            CASE
                WHEN fc.is_positive THEN 'positive'::text
                ELSE 'negative'::text
            END
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS chest_sentiment,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'sleeve'::text) THEN
            CASE
                WHEN fc.is_positive THEN 'positive'::text
                ELSE 'negative'::text
            END
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS sleeve_sentiment,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'length'::text) THEN
            CASE
                WHEN fc.is_positive THEN 'positive'::text
                ELSE 'negative'::text
            END
            ELSE NULL::text
        END) AS length_sentiment,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'overall'::text) THEN ugf.created_at
            ELSE NULL::timestamp without time zone
        END) AS overall_feedback_timestamp,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'chest'::text) THEN ugf.created_at
            ELSE NULL::timestamp without time zone
        END) AS chest_feedback_timestamp,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'sleeve'::text) THEN ugf.created_at
            ELSE NULL::timestamp without time zone
        END) AS sleeve_feedback_timestamp,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'length'::text) THEN ugf.created_at
            ELSE NULL::timestamp without time zone
        END) AS length_feedback_timestamp
   FROM ((((((users u
     LEFT JOIN user_garments ug ON ((u.id = ug.user_id)))
     LEFT JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     LEFT JOIN categories c ON ((ug.category_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN subcategories sc ON ((ug.subcategory_id = sc.id)))
     LEFT JOIN user_garment_feedback ugf ON ((ug.id = ugf.user_garment_id)))
     LEFT JOIN feedback_codes fc ON ((ugf.feedback_code_id = fc.id)))
  GROUP BY u.id, u.email, ug.id, b.name, ug.product_name, ug.size_label, ug.fit_type, c.name, sc.name, ug.created_at
  ORDER BY u.email, ug.created_at DESC;

user_garments_feedback_summary.definition:
SELECT u.email AS user_email,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    ug.product_name,
    count(ugf.id) AS total_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'overall'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS overall_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'chest'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS chest_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'sleeve'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS sleeve_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (ugf.dimension = 'length'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS length_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN fc.is_positive THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS positive_feedback_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (NOT fc.is_positive) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS negative_feedback_count
   FROM ((((users u
     LEFT JOIN user_garments ug ON ((u.id = ug.user_id)))
     LEFT JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     LEFT JOIN user_garment_feedback ugf ON ((ug.id = ugf.user_garment_id)))
     LEFT JOIN feedback_codes fc ON ((ugf.feedback_code_id = fc.id)))
  GROUP BY u.email, b.name, ug.product_name
  ORDER BY u.email, ug.product_name;

user_garments_simple.definition:
SELECT u.id AS user_id,
    u.email AS user_email,
    ug.id AS garment_id,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    ug.product_name,
    ug.fit_feedback,
    ug.feedback_timestamp,
    ug.size_label,
    ug.fit_type,
    c.name AS category_name,
    sc.name AS subcategory_name
   FROM ((((users u
     LEFT JOIN user_garments ug ON ((u.id = ug.user_id)))
     LEFT JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     LEFT JOIN categories c ON ((ug.category_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN subcategories sc ON ((ug.subcategory_id = sc.id)))
  ORDER BY u.email, ug.created_at DESC;

user_latest_feedback_by_dimension.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (u.id, ug.id, ugf.dimension) u.id AS user_id,
    u.email AS user_email,
    u.gender AS user_gender,
    ug.id AS user_garment_id,
    ug.product_name,
    ug.size_label,
    ug.fit_type,
    ug.owns_garment,
    ug.created_at AS garment_created_at,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    c.name AS category_name,
    sc.name AS subcategory_name,
    ugf.dimension,
    fc.feedback_text,
    fc.feedback_type,
    fc.is_positive,
    ugf.created_at AS feedback_created_at,
    ugf.created_by AS feedback_created_by
   FROM ((((((users u
     JOIN user_garments ug ON ((u.id = ug.user_id)))
     JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     JOIN categories c ON ((ug.category_id = c.id)))
     LEFT JOIN subcategories sc ON ((ug.subcategory_id = sc.id)))
     JOIN user_garment_feedback ugf ON ((ug.id = ugf.user_garment_id)))
     JOIN feedback_codes fc ON ((ugf.feedback_code_id = fc.id)))
  ORDER BY u.id, ug.id, ugf.dimension, ugf.created_at DESC;

brand_user_measurement_comparison.definition:
SELECT ug.id AS garment_id,
    ug.user_id,
    b.name AS brand_name,
    ug.product_name,
    ug.size_label,
    COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[]) AS brand_measurements_available,
    COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
           FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
          WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[]) AS user_measurements_entered,
    ARRAY( SELECT unnest(COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest
        EXCEPT
         SELECT unnest(COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
                   FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
                  WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest) AS user_dimension_feedback_missing,
    (COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[]) && COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
           FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
          WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[])) AS has_overlap,
    ARRAY( SELECT unnest(COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
                   FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
                  WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest
        EXCEPT
         SELECT unnest(COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest) AS user_has_brand_missing,
    ARRAY( SELECT unnest(COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest
        INTERSECT
         SELECT unnest(COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
                   FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
                  WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest) AS matching_measurements,
        CASE
            WHEN (COALESCE(array_length(sge.measurements_available, 1), 0) = 0) THEN (0)::numeric
            ELSE round((((array_length(ARRAY( SELECT unnest(COALESCE(sge.measurements_available, ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest
            INTERSECT
             SELECT unnest(COALESCE(( SELECT array_agg(DISTINCT ugf.dimension ORDER BY ugf.dimension) AS array_agg
                       FROM user_garment_feedback ugf
                      WHERE (ugf.user_garment_id = ug.id)), ARRAY[]::text[])) AS unnest), 1))::numeric / (array_length(sge.measurements_available, 1))::numeric) * (100)::numeric), 1)
        END AS coverage_percentage,
    ug.created_at
   FROM ((user_garments ug
     JOIN brands b ON ((ug.brand_id = b.id)))
     LEFT JOIN size_guide_entries sge ON ((ug.size_guide_entry_id = sge.id)))
  WHERE (ug.owns_garment = true)
  ORDER BY b.name, ug.created_at DESC;

brand_measurement_coverage_summary.definition:
SELECT outer_summary.brand_name,
    count(*) AS total_garments,
    round(avg(outer_summary.coverage_percentage), 1) AS avg_coverage_percentage,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (outer_summary.coverage_percentage = (100)::numeric)) AS fully_covered_garments,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE (outer_summary.coverage_percentage = (0)::numeric)) AS no_coverage_garments,
    ( SELECT missing_dims.dimension
           FROM ( SELECT unnest(brand_user_measurement_comparison.user_dimension_feedback_missing) AS dimension
                   FROM brand_user_measurement_comparison
                  WHERE (brand_user_measurement_comparison.brand_name = outer_summary.brand_name)) missing_dims
          GROUP BY missing_dims.dimension
          ORDER BY (count(*)) DESC
         LIMIT 1) AS most_missing_dimension
   FROM brand_user_measurement_comparison outer_summary
  GROUP BY outer_summary.brand_name
  ORDER BY (round(avg(outer_summary.coverage_percentage), 1)) DESC;
